Description:
TAM is a Saudi publicly listed company, specialized in digital solutions and advisory services for public and private sector clients, leading sustainable public transformation from strategy to execution. For over a decade, TAM has been the partner of choice for 50+ government entities. Our agility, expertise, and holistic approach have helped smoothen the processes and paths of Saudi public impact initiatives operating under the Vision 2030 umbrella.We are currently looking for a Business Development Manager, who is going to be responsible for all new client discussions and proposal development beyond our current client list. The role reports to Managing Partner.
Key responsibilities and objectives:Define strategic goals, liaise with business partners and stakeholders, identify new business opportunities
Managing stakeholder expectations, requirements and identifying how they can impact the business
Develop a network of contacts to attract new clients and oversee growth projects
Coordinate department’s research on market insights, industry trends, competing organizations, customer demographics, new technologies and more
Generate sales projections and forecast revenue, in line with projected income
Create financial models, generate pitch decks, prepare fully-fledged proposals for higher-level staff to review
Set KPIs for the business development team and develop strategies to meet those goals
Report and propose interventions to leadership regarding business development and its way forwardAttend professional conferences and industry events for the purpose of lead generation
Manage full-cycle sales process and lead client negotiationsJob Details
